verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam; of man שְׁתַּ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim there were two נָשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim, women בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not the daughters אֵם־ <S%H517><s%> 'em- mother אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat of one הָיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu. become

וַתִּזְנֶ֣ינָה <S%H2181><s%> vat-tiz-Nei-nah And they committed whoredoms בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> ve-mitz-Ra-yim, in Egypt בִּנְעוּרֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H5271><s%> bin-'u-rei-Hen in their youth זָנ֑וּ <S%H2181><s%> za-Nu; they committed whoredoms שָׁ֚מָּה <S%H8033><s%> mah there מֹעֲכ֣וּ <S%H4600><s%> mo-'a-Chu pressed שְׁדֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H7699><s%> she-dei-Hen, there were their breasts וְשָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> ve-Sham and there עִשּׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'is-Su, and there they bruised דַּדֵּ֖י <S%H1717><s%> dad-Dei the teats בְּתוּלֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H1331><s%> be-tu-lei-Hen. of their virginity

וּשְׁמוֹתָ֗ן <S%H8034><s%> u-she-mo-Tan, And the names אָהֳלָ֤ה <S%H170><s%> 'o-ho-Lah of them [were] Aholah הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah the elder וְאָהֳלִיבָ֣ה <S%H172><s%> ve-'o-ho-li-Vah and Aholibah אֲחוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-Tah, her sister וַתִּֽהְיֶ֣ינָה <S%H1961><s%> vat-tih-Yei-nah became לִ֔י Li, וַתֵּלַ֖דְנָה <S%H3205><s%> vat-te-Lad-nah and they were mine and they bare בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim sons וּבָנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> u-va-Not; and daughters וּשְׁמוֹתָ֕ן <S%H8034><s%> u-she-mo-Tan Thus [were] their names שֹׁמְר֣וֹן <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron Samaria אָהֳלָ֔ה <S%H170><s%> 'o-ho-Lah, [is] Aholah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> vi-ru-sha-Lim and Jerusalem אָהֳלִיבָֽה׃ <S%H172><s%> 'o-ho-li-Vah. Aholibah

וַתִּ֥זֶן <S%H2181><s%> vat-Ti-zen played the harlot אָהֳלָ֖ה <S%H170><s%> 'o-ho-Lah And Aholah תַּחְתָּ֑י <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tai; when she was mine וַתַּעְגַּב֙ <S%H5689><s%> vat-ta'-Gav and she doted עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- after מְאַהֲבֶ֔יהָ <S%H157><s%> me-'a-ha-Vei-ha, on her lovers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- after אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur on the Assyrians קְרוֹבִֽים׃ <S%H7138><s%> ke-ro-Vim. [her] neighbours

לְבֻשֵׁ֤י <S%H3847><s%> le-vu-Shei [Which were] clothed תְכֵ֙לֶת֙ <S%H8504><s%> te-Che-let with blue פַּח֣וֹת <S%H6346><s%> pa-Chot captains וּסְגָנִ֔ים <S%H5461><s%> u-se-ga-Nim, and rulers בַּח֥וּרֵי <S%H970><s%> ba-Chu-rei young men חֶ֖מֶד <S%H2531><s%> Che-med all of them desirable כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam; all פָּרָשִׁ֕ים <S%H6571><s%> pa-ra-Shim horsemen רֹכְבֵ֖י <S%H7392><s%> ro-che-Vei riding סוּסִֽים׃ <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim. upon horses

וַתִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> vat-tit-Ten Thus she committed תַּזְנוּתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H8457><s%> taz-nu-Tei-ha her whoredoms עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, them מִבְחַ֥ר <S%H4005><s%> miv-Char with them with all them [that were] the chosen בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- men אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam; all וּבְכֹ֧ל <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom עָֽגְבָ֛ה <S%H5689><s%> 'a-ge-Vah and with all on whom she doted בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all גִּלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-lei-Hem with all their idols נִטְמָֽאָה׃ <S%H2930><s%> nit-Ma-'ah. she defiled

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תַּזְנוּתֶ֤יהָ <S%H8457><s%> taz-nu-Tei-ha she her whoredoms מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim [brought] from Egypt לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not עָזָ֔בָה <S%H5800><s%> 'a-Za-vah, Neither left כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H854><s%> o-Tah for שָׁכְב֣וּ <S%H7901><s%> sha-che-Vu they lay בִנְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5271><s%> vin-'u-Rei-ha, for in her youth וְהֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah like עִשּׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'is-Su with her and they bruised דַּדֵּ֣י <S%H1717><s%> dad-Dei the breasts בְתוּלֶ֑יהָ <S%H1331><s%> ve-tu-Lei-ha; of her virginity וַיִּשְׁפְּכ֥וּ <S%H8210><s%> vai-yish-pe-Chu and poured תַזְנוּתָ֖ם <S%H8457><s%> taz-nu-Tam their whoredom עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha. and

לָכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore נְתַתִּ֖יהָ <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Ti-ha Wherefore I have delivered בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- her into the hand מְאַֽהֲבֶ֑יהָ <S%H157><s%> me-'a-ha-Vei-ha; of her lovers בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad into the hand בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei afflicted אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur, Asshur אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom עָגְבָ֖ה <S%H5689><s%> 'a-ge-Vah upon whom she doted עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem. after

הֵמָּה֮ <S%H1992><s%> hem-Mah They גִּלּ֣וּ <S%H1540><s%> gil-Lu These discovered עֶרְוָתָהּ֒ <S%H6172><s%> 'er-va-Tah her nakedness בָּנֶ֤יהָ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-ha her sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha and her daughters לָקָ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> la-Ka-chu, they took וְאוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> ve-'o-Tah בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ba-Che-rev her with the sword הָרָ֑גוּ <S%H2026><s%> ha-Ra-gu; and slew וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-hi- became שֵׁם֙ <S%H8034><s%> shem and she became famous לַנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> lan-na-Shim, among women וּשְׁפוּטִ֖ים <S%H8196><s%> u-she-fu-Tim judgment עָ֥שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'A-su for they had executed בָֽהּ׃ Vah. ס sa-Mek

וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <S%H7200><s%> vat-Te-re saw אֲחוֹתָ֣הּ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-Tah And when her sister אָהֳלִיבָ֔ה <S%H172><s%> 'o-ho-li-Vah, Aholibah וַתַּשְׁחֵ֥ת <S%H7843><s%> vat-tash-Chet [this] she was more corrupt עַגְבָתָ֖הּ <S%H5691><s%> 'ag-va-Tah in her inordinate love מִמֶּ֑נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah; was more וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תַּ֨זְנוּתֶ֔יהָ <S%H8457><s%> taz-nu-Tei-ha, than she and in her whoredoms מִזְּנוּנֵ֖י <S%H2183><s%> miz-ze-nu-Nei in [her] whoredoms אֲחוֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-Tah. more than her sister

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- after בְּנֵי֩ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei afflicted אַשּׁ֨וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur Asshur עָגָ֜בָה <S%H5689><s%> 'a-Ga-vah She doted פַּח֨וֹת <S%H6346><s%> pa-Chot captains וּסְגָנִ֤ים <S%H5461><s%> u-se-ga-Nim and rulers קְרֹבִים֙ <S%H7138><s%> ke-ro-Vim [her] neighbours לְבֻשֵׁ֣י <S%H3847><s%> le-vu-Shei clothed מִכְל֔וֹל <S%H4358><s%> mich-Lol, most gorgeously פָּרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> pa-ra-Shim horsemen רֹכְבֵ֣י <S%H7392><s%> ro-che-Vei riding סוּסִ֑ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim; upon horses בַּח֥וּרֵי <S%H970><s%> ba-Chu-rei young men חֶ֖מֶד <S%H2531><s%> Che-med all of them desirable כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam. all

וָאֵ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> va-'E-re Then I saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נִטְמָ֑אָה <S%H2930><s%> nit-Ma-'ah; that she was defiled דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech way אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one לִשְׁתֵּיהֶֽן׃ <S%H8147><s%> lish-tei-Hen. [that] they [took] both

וַתּ֖וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> vat-To-sef And [that] she increased אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about תַּזְנוּתֶ֑יהָ <S%H8457><s%> taz-nu-Tei-ha; her whoredoms וַתֵּ֗רֶא <S%H7200><s%> vat-Te-re, for when she saw אַנְשֵׁי֙ <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei men מְחֻקֶּ֣ה <S%H2707><s%> me-chuk-Keh pourtrayed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַקִּ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> hak-Kir, upon the wall צַלְמֵ֣י <S%H6754><s%> tzal-Mei the images; כַשְׂדִּיִּים chas-di-yim ככַשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> chas-Dim, Chaldeans קחֲקֻקִ֖ים <S%H2710><s%> cha-ku-Kim pourtrayed בַּשָּׁשַֽׁר׃ <S%H8350><s%> bash-sha-Shar. with vermilion

חֲגוֹרֵ֨י <S%H2289><s%> cha-go-Rei Girded אֵז֜וֹר <S%H232><s%> e-Zor with girdles בְּמָתְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4975><s%> be-ma-te-nei-Hem, upon their loins סְרוּחֵ֤י <S%H5628><s%> se-ru-Chei exceeding טְבוּלִים֙ <S%H2871><s%> te-vu-Lim in dyed attire בְּרָ֣אשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H7218><s%> be-Ra-shei-Hem, upon their heads מַרְאֵ֥ה <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Eh to look to שָׁלִשִׁ֖ים <S%H7991><s%> sha-li-Shim all of them princes כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam; all דְּמ֤וּת <S%H1823><s%> de-Mut after the manner בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- afflicted בָבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> va-Vel Babel כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> kas-Dim, of Chaldea אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land מוֹלַדְתָּֽם׃ <S%H4138><s%> mo-lad-Tam. of their nativity

וַתַּעְגַּב vat-ta'-gav כוַתַּעְגְּבָ֥ה <S%H5689><s%> vat-ta'-ge-Vah dote קעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem after לְמַרְאֵ֣ה <S%H4758><s%> le-mar-'Eh And as soon as she saw עֵינֶ֑יהָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-ha; them with her eyes וַתִּשְׁלַ֧ח <S%H7971><s%> vat-tish-Lach upon them and sent מַלְאָכִ֛ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to כַּשְׂדִּֽימָה׃ <S%H3778><s%> kas-Di-mah. unto them into Chaldea

וַיָּבֹ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came אֵלֶ֤יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha about בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- afflicted בָבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> va-Vel Babel לְמִשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H4904><s%> le-mish-Kav to her into the bed דֹּדִ֔ים <S%H1730><s%> do-Dim, of love וַיְטַמְּא֥וּ <S%H2930><s%> vay-tam-me-'U and they defiled אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah בְּתַזְנוּתָ֑ם <S%H8457><s%> be-taz-nu-Tam; her with their whoredom וַתִּ֨טְמָא־ <S%H2930><s%> vat-Tit-ma- and she was polluted בָ֔ם Vam, וַתֵּ֥קַע <S%H3363><s%> vat-Te-ka' was alienated נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shah with them and her mind מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem. like

וַתְּגַל֙ <S%H1540><s%> vat-te-Gal So she discovered תַּזְנוּתֶ֔יהָ <S%H8457><s%> taz-nu-Tei-ha, her whoredoms וַתְּגַ֖ל <S%H1540><s%> vat-te-Gal and discovered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֶרְוָתָ֑הּ <S%H6172><s%> 'er-va-Tah; her nakedness וַתֵּ֤קַע <S%H3363><s%> vat-Te-ka' was alienated נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi then my mind מֵֽעָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lei-ha, and כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after נָקְעָ֥ה <S%H5361><s%> na-ke-'Ah was alienated נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi from her like as my mind מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al with אֲחוֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-Tah. from her sister

וַתַּרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> vat-tar-Beh Yet she multiplied אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תַּזְנוּתֶ֑יהָ <S%H8457><s%> taz-nu-Tei-ha; her whoredoms לִזְכֹּר֙ <S%H2142><s%> liz-Kor in calling to remembrance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei the days נְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5271><s%> ne-'u-Rei-ha, of her youth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher when זָנְתָ֖ה <S%H2181><s%> za-ne-Tah wherein she had played the harlot בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַֽתַּעְגְּבָ֔ה <S%H5689><s%> vat-ta'-ge-Vah, For she doted עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al after פִּֽלַגְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <S%H6370><s%> pi-lag-shei-Hem; upon their paramours אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose בְּשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> be-sar- whose flesh חֲמוֹרִים֙ <S%H2543><s%> cha-mo-Rim of asses בְּשָׂרָ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Ram, [is as] the flesh וְזִרְמַ֥ת <S%H2231><s%> ve-zir-Mat and whose issue סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim of horses זִרְמָתָֽם׃ <S%H2231><s%> zir-ma-Tam.
